article_title: Espírito Santo in Downward Spiral as Shares Are Suspended
article_text:
One of Portugal's leading financial institutions is in a tailspin, a descent that started late last year when questions arose about accounting irregularities at its parent company.

Shares in Banco Espírito Santo SA were suspended from trading Thursday after falling an additional 17%. Shares of the lender's controlling shareholder, Espírito Santo Financial Group SA, were also suspended because, it said, of "ongoing material...
